signatures.name: toBoolean(integer) boolean
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to boolean type. Returns true if argument is 1, false if argument is 0, error if argument is other.

signatures.name: toBoolean(string) boolean
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to boolean type. Returns true if argument is "true", false if argument is "false", error if argument is other.

signatures.name: toInteger(boolean) integer
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to integer type. Returns 1 if argument is true, 0 if argument is false.

signatures.name: toInteger(number) integer
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to integer type. Rounds number value down. Returns integer value.

signatures.name: toInteger(string) integer
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to integer type. Returns integer value.

signatures.name: toNumber(integer) number
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to number type. Returns number value.

signatures.name: toNumber(string) number
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to number type. Returns number value.

signatures.name: toString(boolean) string
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to string type. Returns string value.

signatures.name: toString(integer) string
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to string type. Returns string value.

signatures.name: toString(number) string
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to string type. Returns string value.

signatures.name: toString(color) string
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to string type. Returns string value.

signatures.name: toString(url) string
signatures.doc: Converts argument value to string type. Returns string value.

signatures.name: getIntegerValue(string, integer) integer
signatures.doc: Returns the value of a variable by its name. If the variable doesn't exist or has incorrect type, the default value would be returned.

signatures.name: getNumberValue(string, number) number
signatures.doc: Returns the value of a variable by its name. If the variable doesn't exist or has incorrect type, the default value would be returned.

signatures.name: getStringValue(string, string) string
signatures.doc: Returns the value of a variable by its name. If the variable doesn't exist or has incorrect type, the default value would be returned.

signatures.name: getUrlValue(string, url) url
signatures.doc: Returns the value of a variable by its name. If the variable doesn't exist or has incorrect type, the default value would be returned.

signatures.name: getUrlValue(string, string) url
signatures.doc: Returns the value of a variable by its name. If the variable doesn't exist or has incorrect type, the default value would be returned.

signatures.name: getColorValue(string, color) color
signatures.doc: Returns the value of a variable by its name. If the variable doesn't exist or has incorrect type, the default value would be returned.

signatures.name: getColorValue(string, string) color
signatures.doc: Returns the value of a variable by its name. If the variable doesn't exist or has incorrect type, the default value would be returned.

signatures.name: getBooleanValue(string, boolean) boolean
signatures.doc: Returns the value of a variable by its name. If the variable doesn't exist or has incorrect type, the default value would be returned.
